name: walk.
description:
A little bird lost in a moonlit forest and a ghost leading the way.
To get out of here, they walk, walk, walk.

The theme of this game is "Stuck in a loop".

Controls Left and right keysWalk Ludum Dare 47

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/
